name: BHS Testing
info:
Enter the Testing Center and keep left once in the building.
Don't forget your ID and vaccination card if this is for a second dose.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Berkshire Community College Field House
info: EVERYONE IN MASSACHUSETTS IS ELIGIBLE. WALK IN APPOINTMENTS WILL BE AVAILABLE.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Saint Vincent Hospital Vaccine Collaborative @ Worcester State University - Wellness Center
info:
**By Appointment Only** 
Minors under the age of 18 must have signed parental/legal guardian consent upon arrival.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Randolph InterGenerational Center (RICC)
info: Drive through clinic, do not come if you are sick, ID required, wear loose-fitting clothing, cannot be vaccinated within 2 weeks of any other vaccinations.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Rutland Public Library
info: ***First Dose Clinic*** This will be a Pfizer clinic for anyone 16 years and older.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Citizen Center
vaccines: Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine, Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine

special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.
